tasks.task_description: Fix admin user profile lookup - ensure DynamoDB record matches Cognito sub
Verify admin authentication flow works end-to-end
Test and fix admin API endpoints (/admin/solutions, /admin/applications, /admin/users)
Fix CORS issues for admin API calls from frontend
Update admin dashboard to properly fetch and display data
Test complete admin workflow: login -> dashboard -> manage solutions/users

description: Rebuild admin functionality from scratch - fix authentication, API endpoints, and dashboard access step by step
context: Fixed profile function - simplified code to lookup user by userId from Cognito claims. DynamoDB record exists with correct userId matching Cognito sub. Profile function deployed successfully.
Fixed Lambda environment variable - profile function now uses correct table name 'marketplace-users-1759859485186' instead of 'marketplace-users'. This was the root cause of 404 errors.

Fixed table names for multiple Lambda functions - RegisterFunction, CatalogFunction, and UserManagementFunction now use correct table names with suffix -1759859485186. This was a systemic issue affecting all functionality.
Fixed admin dashboard routing - changed route from /simple-admin to /admin/dashboard to match navigation link. Frontend rebuilt and deployed.

Fixed catalog function permissions - added DynamoDB Query/Scan permissions for marketplace-solutions-1759859485186 table and its indexes. This was causing 500 errors when customers tried to browse solutions.
Completed admin functionality rebuild. Now starting partner workflow fixes based on requirements analysis.
